body:
### Problem
1. Run any test will show as following
![Screen Shot 2020-08-23 at 8 21 49 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37643086/90965142-b6151700-e519-11ea-82ad-755ac349e669.png)

2. when running a single/group test by clicking the icon in the editor. 'SILENT_OBSERVATORY' will show up.
![Screen Shot 2020-08-23 at 8 27 10 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37643086/90965233-76026400-e51a-11ea-8274-5145647cc25a.png)

comment_data.body: Can you provide some details on what version of Flutter you are on and what action you took to run the tests?

Hi @jacob314 ,

Thanks for your reply, please see the following details.

#### Flutter doctor
```
[âœ“] Flutter (Channel beta, 1.21.0-9.1.pre, on Mac OS X 10.15.6 19G2021, locale en-NZ)
 
[âœ“] Android toolchain - develop for Android devices (Android SDK version 29.0.3)
[âœ“] Xcode - develop for iOS and macOS (Xcode 11.6)
[âœ“] Android Studio (version 4.0)
[âœ“] IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate Edition (version 2020.2)
[âœ“] VS Code (version 1.46.0)
[âœ“] Connected device (1 available)
```
#### Plugin and IDE version
```
Flutter 48.1.2 for Android Studio 4.0.1 Build #AI-193.6911.18.40.6626763, built on June 25, 2020
Flutter 48.1.4 for IntelliJ IDEA 2020.2 (Ultimate Edition) Build #IU-202.6397.94, built on July 27, 2020
```
@Peng-Qian does this problem occur if you use the stable channel of Flutter?

Hi @stevemessick ,

In the stable channel, tests can display the filename, but the second problem still there.
![Screen Shot 2020-09-03 at 3 47 15 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37643086/92069296-17cc5f80-edfd-11ea-9d55-68c016ac13dd.png)
I'm using the master channel. It looks like the name is there but is hidden by "no name". cc @jacob314 @devoncarew

The name of a virtual group changed from `null` to `""` in beta.
From master:
```json
{"group":{"id":2,"suiteID":0,"parentID":null,"name":"","metadata":{"skip":false,"skipReason":null},"testCount":1,"line":null,"column":null,"url":null},"type":"group","time":1840}
```
From stable:
```json
{"group":{"id":2,"suiteID":0,"parentID":null,"name":null,"metadata":{"skip":false,"skipReason":null},"testCount":1,"line":null,"column":null,"url":null},"type":"group","time":1800}
```
I think we need to change line 595 of DartTestEventsConverterZ.java to check for an empty string. Unfortunately, I have to debug why I can't run tests from the debugger right now...
Issue still occurs on the latest version of IntelliJ IDEA 2020.2.3 (Ultimate Edition).

I'm still facing this issue.

I have the same problem using IntelliJ Community Edition: ``` IntelliJ IDEA 2021.1.1 (Community Edition) Build #IC-211.7142.45, built on April 30, 2021 Runtime version: 11.0.10+9-b1341.41 x86_64 VM: Dynamic Code Evolution 64-Bit Server VM by JetBrains s.r.o. macOS 11.2.3 GC: G1 Young Generation, G1 Old Generation Memory: 1024M Cores: 8 Non-Bundled Plugins: com.jetbrains.webstorm.web-assembly-plugin (1.3.211), com.thvardhan.gradianto (4.4), name.kropp.intellij.makefile (211.6693.108), Dart (211.7233), org.toml.lang (0.2.147.3871-211), org.jetbrains.kotlin (211-1.5.10-release-891-IJ7142.45), org.rust.lang (0.4.147.3871-211) Kotlin: 211-1.5.10-release-891-IJ7142.45 ``` With Dart Plugin version `211.7233` (So I think this problem is not limited to the Flutter plugin). This becomes a serious problem when there's a problem in the test setup, as in such cases I can't click on the failed test and can't figure out even where the test failure is occurring!

The bug has been reported by another user already to Jetbrains: https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/WEB-51106

Please vote there for them to fix this.

title: Flutter Test shows <no name> instead of file name in Android Studio and IntelliJ
